playermessage.artifactory.item_not_usabl: Must attune to item to use.
playermessage.artifactory.item_not_equip: Must attune to item to equip.
playermessage.artifactory.owned_by_anoth: This item is attuned to someone else.
playermessage.artifactory.bond_broken: You feel the bond between you and %1$s break.
playermessage.artifactory.cant_use_manag: This feature is turned off. Enable in server config.
screen.text.artifactory.confirmation.del: Are you sure you want to remove attunement to %1$s? This can't be undone.
screen.text.artifactory.attunement.title: Attune Items
screen.tooltip.artifactory.xp_level_thre: Must have a total of %1$s levels to begin.
This item is unique and already attuned by %1$. You cannot attune it until they break their attunement.
This item is unique and already attuned by another player. You cannot attune it until they break their attunement.
This item is unique and you are already attuned to another of it's kind.
You have reached your maximum number of unique attunements.
screen.tooltip.artifactory.attuned_to_ot: This is attuned to another player. Cannot attune.
screen.tooltip.artifactory.max_attunemen: You have reached the maximum attunement level with this item.
screen.tooltip.artifactory.attuned_by_an: This item is already attuned by %1$s.
screen.tooltip.artifactory.item_in_slot_: Max level reached, cannot ascend further.
